channel.title: Project-RS-07 : The Next Big Remake
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://puu.sh/4QnOZ[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/52OWc.png[/img][url=http://projectrs07.x10host.com]Website[/url] | [img]http://puu.sh/52OXp.png[/img][url=http://projectrs07.x10host.com/forums/]Forums[/url]
Pre-Alpha Preview. [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iz7yCIVflC4[/youtube] [/CENTER]
Welcome to the next big remake thread, based on the 474 revision of RS (October 22nd 2007). Unprecedented detail is my goal. The little details, the things you haven't seen on other remake threads are what will reside here. Jam packed with features is priority, and not a rune stone left unturned.
Not only will I be developing the server to emulate RS, but I'll be keeping the biggest remake archive of information to release to the community once the server goes online. No dead line for this project, it will take as long as it takes.
[b]Why [i]Another [/i]Remake?[/b] Why not? Personal satisfaction maybe. An old school '07 server that you can play for free using membership features. Not run by Jagex. Not adding 2009 features to a 2007 server. You name it.
[B]Key Development Plans[/B]
[ul][li]Security analysing (we don't want to be hacked on the first day)[/li] [li]High end administration (making sure all aspects are prepared for when the game goes live)[/li] [li]Server maintainability (hundreds of logs, safe checks for important things like adding items, experience etc.)[/li] [li]Unprecedented detail (insignificance is not an issue)[/li][/ul]
[B]Skills[/B]
[b]*Locations :[/b] [url=http://puu.sh/4QEC4.png]Asgarnia[/url], [url=http://puu.sh/4QEBd.png]Kandarin[/url] and [url=http://puu.sh/4QECS.png]Misthalin[/url]. For now, [i]all locations[/i] will only refer to the three kingdoms.
[b][u]Experience Rate[/u][/b] [b]Skilling:[/b] (x10) : exp * 10 [b]Combat:[/b] (x15) : 4 * 15 * hit
[img]http://puu.sh/4RG2b.gif[/img][b]Combat[/b]
[ul][li]Full PvN[/li] [li]Full PvP[/li] [li]Full NvN[/li] [li]All obtainable weapon's special attacks[/li] [li]Boss monsters[/li] [li]Player and NPC poisoning ([url=http://puu.sh/504Jt.png]image[/url])[/ul]
[img]http://puu.sh/4RG3L.gif[/img][b]Ranged[/b]
[ul][li]Wooden bows and arrows[/li] [li]Special bows[/li] [li]Cross bows and bolts[/li] [li]Knives, darts and throwing axes[/li][/ul]
[img]http://puu.sh/4RG4E.gif[/img][b]Magic[/b]
[ul][li]All Normal spells[/li] [li]All Ancient spells[/li] [li]All Lunar spells[/li][/ul]
[img]http://puu.sh/4RG5G.gif[/img][b]Prayer[/b]
[ul][li]All enhancement prayers[/li] [li]All overhead prayers[/li][/ul]
[img]http://puu.sh/4RG75.gif[/img][b]Slayer[/b]
[ul][li]All slayer tasks[/li] [li]Monster killing aspects ([url=http://pastebin.com/71wj3q70]see more[/url])[/li][/ul]
[img]http://puu.sh/4RG89.gif[/img][b]Agility[/b]
[ul][li]Shortcuts[/li] [li]Gnome Stronghold Agility Course[/li] [li]Barbarian Outpost Agility Course[/li] [li]Brimhaven Agility Course[/li] [li]Ape Atoll Agility Course[/li] [li]Wilderness Agility Course[/li][/ul]
[img]http://puu.sh/4RFZH.gif[/img][b]Herblore[/b]
[ul][li]Cleaning[/li] [li]Unfinished potions[/li] [li]Secondary ingredients[/li] [li]Doses (item on item)[/li] [li]Vial filling (all water sources)[/li] [li]Vial emptying[/li][/ul]
[img]http://puu.sh/4QDXH.gif[/img][b]Fishing[/b] ([url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=N3QNm_fWOoI]video[/url])
[ul][li]Formula corresponding to fishing level and type of fish fishing[/li] [li]22/22 types of fish available ([url=http://pastebin.com/u0Kw6EiG]list[/url])[/li] [li]Big fish[/li] [li]Full Karambwan vessel fishing[/li] [li]Enhancements (fishing potions, fish pies, admiral pies)[/li] [li]Fishing Guild[/li] [li]Caskets[/li] [li]Random events[/li] [li]Messages[/li] [li]*Locations : all mapped[/li][/ul]
[img]http://puu.sh/4RFQ4.gif[/img][b]Cooking[/b]
[ul][li]Fish[/li] [li]Meat[/li] [li]Pies[/li] [li]Pizzas[/li] [li]Bread/cakes[/li] [li]Vegtables[/li] [li]Drinks[/li] [li]Cooking gauntlets[/li][/ul]
[img]http://puu.sh/4RB2w.gif[/img][b]Mining[/b]
[ul][li]Formula corresponding to mining level and pickaxe used[/li] [li]Uses best pickaxe for level regardless of pickaxe wielded[/li] [li]Every ore ([url=http://pastebin.com/3e3FYWvi]list[/url])[/li] [li]Mining guild[/li] [li]Random events[/li] [li]Enhancements[/li] [li]Gems[/li] [li]Amulet of glory effects chance of getting gems[/li] [li]Messages[/li] [li]*Locations : all mapped[/li][/ul]
[img]http://puu.sh/4RFM2.gif[/img][b]Smithing[/b]
[ul][li]All bronze items[/li] [li]All iron items[/li] [li]All steel items[/li] [li]All mithril items[/li] [li]All adamant items[/li] [li]All runite items[/li][/ul]
[img]http://puu.sh/4RFK6.gif[/img][b]Woodcutting[/b]
[ul][li]Formula corresponding to woodcutting level, tree and axe used[/li] [li]Uses best axe for level regardless of axe wielded[/li] [li]Every log[/li] [li]Random events[/li] [li]Tree felling and respawning[/li] [li]Bird's nests[/li] [li]Messages[/li][/ul]
[img]http://puu.sh/4RFNl.gif[/img][b]Firemaking[/b]
[ul][li]All logs[/li] [li]Drops log then attempts to light[/li] [li]Clipped[/li] [li]Can't light a fire on top of another[/li] [li]Reduces to ashes[/li] [li]Cool down timer and formula for flow (firemaking level dependant)[/li] [li]Messages[/li][/ul]
[img]http://puu.sh/4RFUg.gif[/img][b]Fletching[/b]
[ul][li]Every bow (u) and strung[/li] [li]Arrow shafts, headless arrows, arrows[/li] [li]Crossbow stocks)[/li] [li]Flax picking and spinning[/li] [li]Messages[/li][/ul]
[img]http://puu.sh/4RFW7.gif[/img][b]Crafting[/b]
[ul][li]Tanning[/li] [li]Leather and dragon leather crafting[/li] [li]Gem cutting[/li] [li]Jewelry crafting[/li] [li]Spinning wheel ([url=http://puu.sh/4SdXm.png]image[/url])[/li] [li]Messages[/li][/ul]
[img]http://puu.sh/4RFXo.gif[/img][b]Runecrafting[/b]
[ul][li]All altars craftable[/li] [li]Talismans[/li] [li]Tiaras[/li] [li]Pouches[/li] [li]Abyss[/li][/ul]
[img]http://puu.sh/4RFRU.gif[/img][b]Thieving[/b]
[ul][li]NPC[/li] [li]Stalls[/li] [li]Chests[/li][/ul]
[img]http://puu.sh/4UeBN.png[/img][b]Miscellaneous[/b]
[ul][li]Tutorial island[/li] [li]Ladders/stairs/trapdoors[/li] [li]Doors[/li] [li]Chests/bookcases/draws/cabinets[/li] [li]Music and sounds[/li] [li]Completed towns (0/17 : list)[/li][/ul]
[i]Complete RS Shops[/i] [url=http://puu.sh/4Wuuz.png]http://puu.sh/4Wuuz.png[/url]
[url=http://puu.sh/4SbND.gif]Rune essence pouches.gif[/url]
[url=http://puu.sh/4Rtes.gif]Karambwan fishing.gif[/url]
[i]Enchanted bolt effects.[/i] [img]http://puu.sh/4UV14.png[/img]
[i]Redemption healing.[/i] [img]http://puu.sh/4UUSF.png[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/504Jt.png[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/5061s.png[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/4RETv.png[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/525cQ.png[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/524Tj.png[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/524UQ.png[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/524WK.png[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/524YG.png[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/5250j.png[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/5255r.png[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/5257I.png[/img]
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Lz-W4-MlT0Y[/youtube]
[i]Old school remake information/resources greatly appreciated.[/i]

item.title: Project-RS-07 : The Next Big Remake

item.description:

Alpha released, you will keep your stats, so come and get a head start: https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,653681.new.html

item.title: Project-RS-07 : The Next Big Remake
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[quote=“RS From The 00s, post:38, topic:534139”]Been working on the following for the last two days:

[ul]Shop restocking (done)
Brimhaven dungeon (entry requirement like RS, done except metal dragons)
Dwarven mines crossbow shop and Catherby range shop
Ideas to implement RFD gloves: add the last boss now, and each time the quest is expanded, add the requirement for the gloves to be re-equipped for players who already have them (RFD quest is huge)[/ul]

Unfortunately I cannot find the child ids for the real crafting interface (446), so I have had to do this:

I know it’s shit for a remake, but I really had no other choice. If anyone thinks they can help, view this topic:
https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,653447.new.html[/quote]
Use the text interface command.

Read full topic

Unfortunately I cannot find the child ids for the real crafting interface (446), so I have had to do this:

item.title: Project-RS-07 : The Next Big Remake
item.dc:creator: @RS_From_The_00s RS From The 00s
item.description:
@RS_From_The_00s wrote:

I Roll Deep:

Love the pouches (I’ve never thinked about adding them lol, I’ve forgot they even exist lol) and I like the door system

The door system is good, but I have still yet to add a open(true) boolean so it will return to the closed state. At the moment you can just click the door open, then 2 other directions before it returns to the closed state.

item.title: Project-RS-07 : The Next Big Remake
item.dc:creator: @RS_From_The_00s RS From The 00s
item.description:
@RS_From_The_00s wrote:

P-RS-07 Pre-Alpha Preview Promotion Video: please don’t be too jealous of my godly video making skills.

[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iz7yCIVflC4[/youtube]

RiiPiiNFtW:

I was happy when they died off. I just don’t seen any form of remakes being successful. Sorry. Good luck though I guess.

You’re quite right, which is why I haven’t claimed that “All other remakes fail, but this won’t!” etc. Actions speak louder than words.

Finished the Mining and Fishing guild. Reworked the door system to make it easier for me to add mass doors, and added web slashing (for some reason the weapon animation doesn’t animate).

Been adding doors and ladders lately, so not much to show apart from that.

Currently developing Lumbridge to full. A cool little touch I added:

Read full topic

item.title: Project-RS-07 : The Next Big Remake
item.dc:creator: @RS_From_The_00s RS From The 00s
item.description:
@RS_From_The_00s wrote:

[quote=“arham 4, post:21, topic:534139”][quote author=RS From The 00s link=topic=652934.msg4376396#msg4376396 date=1382187109]

This looks good. But the exp rate is a bit to much, I am not a person to judge or tell you but I’d leave the exp rate at 1-10. The higher it is the faster it is to achieve, and the soul purpose of a remake is low exp rate and lots of gameplay.

Thanks, the exp rate can always change. I’ll reconsider it as time goes by and hopefully find the best rate.

Every skill is now trainable. Smithing is fixed thanks to Andrew.
[/quote]
Every skill includes Slayer, Farming, and Construction?[/quote]

Oops, you’re right. Not farming, construction or hunter. :o Completely forgot about those (will implement them when the others are all green).

Read full topic

item.title: Project-RS-07 : The Next Big Remake
item.dc:creator: @RS_From_The_00s RS From The 00s
item.description:
@RS_From_The_00s wrote:

[quote=“Titanium_, post:17, topic:534139”]Please tell me this isnt Project Insanity and at least say 1) its your own framework, 2) its hyperion based, 3) its runesource based.

Anything thats PI is not a proper 07 remake xD[/quote]
It’s Hyperion.

New door system, fuck coordinates in an xml : my way is just a formula, all I have to do is declare each door ID in a list.

Mining Updates

[ul][li]Gems[/li]
[li]Amulet of glory effects chance of getting gems[/li][/ul]

99% runecrafting pouches:

[ul][li]Fills only the set amount (3, 6, 9, 12 / small, medium, large, giant)[/li]
[li]Can’t fill if already filled[/li]
[li]Can’t empty if no space in inventory[/li]
[li]Checking option[/li]
[li]Saves on logout[/li][/ul]

Read full topic
